title: Jinx mains
body:
Looking for all jinx mains. Want to learn more and more love the character.
Add
Dawgntheboys

replies.body:
im a jinx main lv 7 and got star guardian
i will add u

You can also try rocket and w at the same time. 

Harras them down with rockets during lane (dont oom tho) and play the kite game. 

rush BF sword then hurricane then gg

I recommend if you go and try and all in. Auto with your Q in Mini Gun form, then switch to rockets before ULTing the enemy as they would be super low. Remember, ULT has missing HP damage. 

Also, when you get Runaans (Usually 2nd Item for me), use your rockets to clear lane. Allows quick clears so you can get to team fights without worrying about a minion lane being pushed
